issues.description: The problem statement and template expect animal classes named Seal, Pig, and Goat (see UML and Main.java), but the solution repository defines classes named SpaceSeal, SpacePig, and SpaceGoat. This naming mismatch prevents students from finding the expected class names and causes compilation errors when following the template.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the solution classes to match the expected names: remove the “Space” prefix so that SpaceSeal, SpacePig, and SpaceGoat become Seal, Pig, and Goat, and update all references accordingly.
